FileFormat.FormatName: Microsoft Visual FoxPro database container (memo files)
FileFormat.FormatDescription: This is an outline record only, and requires further details, research or authentication to provide information that will enable users to further understand the format and to assess digital preservation risks associated with it if appropriate. InternalSignature.SignatureName: Microsoft Visual FoxPro database container (memo files)
InternalSignature.SignatureNote: Rudimentary signature developed utilising collection of dct files obtained from Visual Fox Pro 7 Databases and webharvested samples.
